notifications.title: Welcome to our new Code Club website with all latest updates
notifications.message: We’ve rolled out performance improvements and bug fixes.

notifications.title: Status Red – Heavy rain and localised flooding
notifications.message: Take care on roads and allow extra travel time.

notifications.title: No classes
notifications.message: No classes on 25th of October, and 1st of November

notifications.title: Classes finishing on the 6th of December
notifications.message:
We will be finishing classes on the 6th of December, and we will continue with certificates and belts given in January 2026.

If you were signed up for the most recent semester, you should receive an email with the form to sign up for next year.
